title: Ban players who leave during champ select..
body:
GOD!

Make it so if player leaves during champ select he would get 14 day ban, for fuck sake and yes i'm not joking............. i fucking want to play some draft, does this shit happen in ranked too?

replies.body: Ban players for doing the 1 thing that lets them get away from a troll? Sounds good to me

It's called dodging, and yes, it happens in ranked as well, and in ranked it does have a punishment, but it's also way too helpful to be something that would ban you.

Trust me, when you learn how to properly dodge, you will see how useful it is.
couldnt agree more, it takes 10 years to play a game because people keep leaving when the baby doesnt get his favourite champ
Ban players who leave during games instead.
Dodging should be lightly punished, as it is, but never seriously punished. It's the only way you can escape from a toxic/troll team, especially in Ranked.

you already loose LP for it and get a timer before being able to queue up again...
Not to mention that a lot of Leagues bugs happen in the launcher and there for also in champ select.
Not being able to lock in a champ or being able to change runes...
Then there are people you sleep for a secound and ban a champ insteadof picking him or locked in the wrong champion, because they were under time pressure
